summary: A complete visual, audio, and gameplay package. Aimed at greatly improving the atmosphere and gameplay experience while not straying from the vanilla look and lore.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/mw9LI.png[/img]
[center][color=black]----------[/color]
[size=2][color=red]Please remember to endorse so this gets more exposure! If you have any criticism or praise feel free to leave a comment and I\'ll read it when I get a chance.[/color][/size]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[size=2]Changelog[/size]
[size=1][color=black]·[/color] v2.0 released. Added and updated nearly sixty mods.
[color=black]·[/color] v1.6 released. Added and updated four mods.
[color=black]·[/color] v1.5 released. Added and updated over a dozen mods.
[color=black]·[/color] v1.0 initial release.[/size]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[size=4]Features[/size]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[size=3][color=black]·[/color] Overhauled visuals to provide a more realistic and gritty atmosphere while pertaining a vanilla-like quality.

[color=black]·[/color] Tweaks to the outstanding audio to squash a few irritating issues.

[color=black]·[/color] Gameplay changes to realistically enhance and extend content.

[color=black]·[/color] Easy and intuitive install aimed at eliminating the hassle of downloading and installing dozens of different mods.[/size]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[size=4]Photography[/size]
[size=0.5]All screenshots were taken with Ultra settings @ 1920x1080 - 8x AA - 16x AF. SES screenshots were taken using the contents of this suite, and the recommended mods listed below.[/size]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LWwQZ.jpg[/img]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/b0Ug7.jpg[/img]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[size=3]Recommended Modifications[/size]
[size=0.5]Install these after the suite.[/size]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[color=black]·[/color] [color=red][b]To prevent any crashes or hiccups I highly recommend downloading [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1013]4GB Skyrim[/url][/b][/color]
[color=black]·[/color] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1754]Weapon Retexture Project[/url]
[color=black]·[/color] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=726673]Xenius\' Character Enhancement[/url]
[color=black]·[/color] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=141]Vurt\'s Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]
[color=black]·[/color] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=440451]KenMOD Interface Improvements[/url]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[size=3]FAQ[/size]
[color=black]----------[/color]
[size=2][color=black]·[/color] I\'ve followed the install instructions but my game keeps crashing! You broke my game! I hate you![/size]
[size=1]I\'m sorry! I didn\'t do it on purpose, I promise! This suite comes with greatly improved and enlarged textures. It takes quite a bit more memory to keep running stable. I\'ve stated this multiple times but I\'m about to do it again. If you\'re experiencing crashes or bugs I highly recommend downloading and installing [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1013]4GB Skyrim.[/url] It should fix all of your issues, promise![/size]
[size=2][color=black]·[/color] I\'ve got everything set up and running but it\'s dropped my FPS! What can I do to speed my game up?[/size]
[size=1]Once again, I\'m sorry! This suite can drop your FPS if you\'re running on outdated hardware. In fact, I don\'t recommend installing it at all unless you can easily run everything maxed out. (But some people are fine running below 60 fps. If you\'re not sure just try it out for yourself!) If you know that your computer is plenty fast enough but it\'s still hitching you can try the normal procedure. Defrag your HD, delete some old programs, defragment Skyrim\'s cache files, and if worse comes to worse drop your graphics settings! It\'ll still look a [b]lot[/b] better than Vanilla.[/size]
[size=2][color=black]·[/color] Okay, but why is everything so dark? Are you crazy?! I can barely even see in caves![/size]
[size=1]I can\'t apologize for this because it\'s entirely intentional. My aim when tweaking the shader files was to make the game much more atmospheric. I\'ve done this by realistically portraying caves and houses lit by candle light all while not straying very far from the vanilla color palette but adding a bit more saturation so the game doesn\'t look so washed out. I guess it all comes down to personal taste. But really, how well would a house be lit if the only source of light was a few candles here and a couple of lanterns over there? The outsides are brightly lit during the day but nights are dark and terrifying. Walk into an inn with a fire pit burning and you\'ll see that everything is basked brightly in a warm yellow glow. But walk into a cave and see that it\'ll be somewhat difficult to navigate with no light source. Meaning that there\'s finally a use to carry a torch. Heck, even give one to your companion and they\'ll use it when it\'s dark! Hurray! Torches![/size]
[size=2][color=black]·[/color] I don\'t like how (insert mod here) modifies my gameplay. But I want everything else! How do I turn it off?[/size]
[size=1]You can disable any mod that doesn\'t solely modify textures by opening your Skyrim launcher, going to data files, and then unchecking any modification you\'d like to turn off! If you really don\'t like the mod you can go to c:/Program Files/Skyrim/Data and look for the .esp file. Once you\'ve found it, delete it, and then go enjoy your now-modified modification![/size]
[color=black]----------[/color]

[size=1]Do not distribute the contents of this package under any circumstances. I have been granted permission to include every mod included in this compilation. Find the creator in the section above and contact them regarding any special permissions.

If you see your mod included in this enhancement and feel that I have misinterpreted any description or message I have received granting distribution rights, please feel free to message me so we can resolve the issue.[/size][/center]
author: Senescent
